# [Interview #847: Melbourne SupaNova 2012 - Q&A Podcast with Brandon Sanderson, Entry #13](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=847#13)

#### Moderator

We've unfortunately run out of time. I want everyone to give up the most massive applause. Brandon Sanderson!
